name: Figma Brand Kit (free version)
description:
With this template you will be able (limited in the free version) to quickly create a brand system design and templates. It helps you save dozens of hours of work.


It includes a full brand company setup, layouts, templates (print + digital), mockups and shapes. With the full version (paid) you will be able to create in a fraction of the time a full brand presentation with 30+ pages and all design from business cards to landing page, from social mockups to export of logos in all most common sizes.


Included in the FULL version (available on gumroad.com/colorburn for 59$):

  • Full brand system with nested components
  • Variants with properties
  • Print templates (business cards, flyers, letterheads, ...)
  • Digital templates (social media, landing page, google ads, ...)
  • 6 Mockups (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Landing Page)
  • Master brand presentation with 30+ pages
  • Color scheme preview tool
  • 60+ layouts
  • Quickly export Logos in all commonly used sizes
